name: Music_2777.wav
keywords: ['hip-hop', 'christmas music', 'child voice', 'male vocal', 'rapping', 'groovy bass', 'electronic drums', 'sleigh bells', 'festive', 'amusing', 'urban']
caption: This is a Christmas music piece in the style of hip-hop. There is a child voice announcing the arrival of Santa. The male vocalist is rapping. There is a groovy bass line in the beat. The rhythmic background is provided by an electronic drum beat that has sleigh bells in it. The atmosphere is festive and amusing at the same time. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a comedic Christmas movie.
